active_incidents.title: Degraded performance and connection issues for a very low percentage of users

notes.body: We've isolated the issue and users should no longer be having issues with Slack. We're still working towards a full resolution and we'll be back with another update in 30 minutes.

Some people may be having trouble loading Slack via the desktop and mobile app, as well as web browser. This is currently effecting a very low percentage of users but may result in general slowness and issues with sending messages. Weâ€™re investigating and will have more information to share in 30 minutes.
